snippet: Russell Martin’s two-run single against Craig Kimbrel capped a four-run eighth, and the Blue Jays held on to win at Boston.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays defeat Red Sox, 4-3, in annual Patriots' Day game; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Martin’s two-run single against Craig Kimbrel capped a four-run eighth, and the Blue Jays held on to win at Boston.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Bullpen Comes Apart in Eighth
headline.main: Red Sox’ Bullpen Comes Apart in Eighth
